newsitem.title: SPAIN: Spain 1997 GDP to grow 2.7 percent - BCH.
newsitem.headline: Spain 1997 GDP to grow 2.7 percent - BCH.

text.p: Spanish bank Banco Central Hispano (BCH) said on Thursday it forecast Spanish gross domestic product growth of 2.7 percent in 1997.

In a note, BCH said Spain's GDP was likely to show low growth in the first quarter after a truckers' strike and bad weather in January, but it is expected to rebound later in the year reaching a level of 2.9 percent in the last quarter.

On Wednesday, Economy Secretary Cristobal Montoro said Spain's 1996 GDP, which rose 2.2 percent during the year and 2.6 percent in the last quarter year-on-year, supported the government forecast for three-percent 1997 growth.
